attributes.action: Only allow the sale of silent fireworks.
attributes.additional_details: People with ptsd from several experiences within their lives, ex our armed forces, fought for this country yet we are currently supporting or consider them when the use of fireworks with sounds and loud explosions are allow. It is petrifying and trigger for them. Also our pets, wildlife & livestock. Causing some to flee because they’re so scared. Also the shaking, panting/over panicking of our animals can cause them to go into cardiac arrest. The noises can also be scary to children/elders.
attributes.background: Fireworks with sound to be banned completely. Only silent fireworks allowed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
